meanings.definition: A large brown insect that is often found in dirty or damp buildings.
meanings.sent1: I saw cockroaches scurrying across the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent2: The exterminator was called to get rid of the cockroaches in the apartment.
meanings.sent3: The cockroaches were having a party in the trash can.
meanings.sent4: The cockroaches infested the old house like an army of invaders.
meanings.sent5: The sight of cockroaches crawling on the walls was enough to make anyone shudder.

meanings.definition: A person who is considered to be unpleasant or disgusting.
meanings.sent1: She always avoided that cockroach at work because he was so rude.
meanings.sent2: The bully in school was known as the cockroach of the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The cockroach of the group always brought negativity to the conversation.
meanings.sent4: He scurried away like a cockroach when confronted about his behavior.
meanings.sent5: The cockroach of a boss made everyone's workday miserable.
